item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Sunday, September 1, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. CHERI Myths: I don’t need CHERI if I have safe languages (19 points | 38 comments)

10. Bubble Sort Is Not Robust Either (20 points | 4 comments)
11. Honey, I shrunk {fmt}: bringing binary size to 14k and ditching the C++ runtime (23 points | 2 comments)
12. Boox Palma Review: A Phone-Sized E-Ink Android Device that isn’t a Phone (1 points | 3 comments)
13. Ruby shebang behavior (29 points | 11 comments)

24. Writing APIs in Rust (2022) (14 points | 1 comment)
